install.name: Docman jDMTree
install.author: Josh Prakash
install.description: Docman jDMTree 1.5 - This module shows a list of defined Categories,Sub Categories and Documents in a tree for Joomla 1.5. Developed by Josh Prakash. (C) 2008 www.youthpole.com

param.name: countd
param.label: Document Display Count
param.description: The number of documents to be displayed in each category or subcategory (default 5)

param.name: lengthc
param.label: Maximum Category Length
param.description: Number of characters in Category Name before Truncation (default 20)

param.name: lengthd
param.label: Maximum Document Length
param.description: Number of characters in Document Name before Truncation (default 20)

param.name: orderby
param.label: Sort order
param.description: Sorting Order of Documents (default Last Update Date DESC)

param.name: moredesc
param.label: Category Link Label
param.description: Label for More button link to the category (default is View Category)

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
